oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Felix G. Miller, DeSales Harrison, W. E. Brock, and Don H. Overmyer correspondence with employers of Chattanooga and Hamilton County, 1962 August 6
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Brock, William Emerson, 1930- ; Harrison, DeSales, 1899-1973; Miller, Felix G.; Overmyer, Don H.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter to employers in the Chattanooga and Hamilton County, Tennessee, urging business to encourage peaceful behavior from their employees as the city desegregates the public schools.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: School integration -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
Chattanooga Public Schools (Chattanooga, Tenn.)
